desc: 100% natural, hand-poured soy candles and wax melts, made in England from beautifully blended oils contained in dark amber toned glass. All Pooch&Pup candles are dog friendly, cruelty free, vegan and come in 100% recyclable and eco friendly packaging. We do our little bit to make the world a better place.

layout.text: Cleaner candles for you & your dog
Non-toxic scents | 100% soy wax | eco-packaging | made in England
